Dwight: Uh, excuse me. Trying to get work done. Some people don’t care about Jim’s new sports job in Phila-Whatever.Philadelphia. From the greek phila meaning “Love,” and adelph, meaning “Adolf.” “the city that loves Adolf.” Good luck with your new enterprise and don’t wear the blue striped shirt. I think it was someone really popular.[Holds up a picture] This is me and my family celebrating Pennsylvania Dutch Christmas in 1982 on the farm. There’s me and my brother Jeb breaking the ceremonial pig rib. He doesn’t come back for Christmas anymore. The sepia tint is from an app on my phone. This is the same photo, matrix style.Yes! Yeah! [High Fives Jim] Yeah! Okay! Yes! It’s a Christmas Miracle! [High Fives Pam] Yeah!
